Description: Ostracon, on fragment of dark green steatite; bearing scratched Greek text.
Curator's comments: The nature of this inscribed scrap is unclear. If it is of later Archaic date the uncertain letter in the second name should be chi; tau, phi and psi are unlikely interpretations. Names, Herakleides, Kallicho
Bibliographic references: Petrie 1886 / Naukratis. Part I., 1884-85 (pl. XX, no. 32)
Höckmann & Möller 2006 / The Hellenion at Naukratis: Questions and Observations (p.16, no.71)
Bernand 1970 / Le Delta égyptien d'après les textes grecs, i: les confins libyques (no. 2)
Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (BC.02)
